definitions.text: contribute to the progress or growth of
examples: I am promoting the use of computers in the classroom

definitions.text: give a promotion to or assign to a higher position
examples: John was kicked upstairs when a replacement was hired
Women tend not to advance in the major law firms
I got promoted after many years of hard work

definitions.text: make publicity for; try to sell (a product)
examples: The salesman is aggressively pushing the new computer model
The company is heavily advertizing their new laptops

definitions.text: be changed for a superior chess or checker piece
change a pawn for a better piece by advancing it to the eighth row, or change a checker piece for a more valuable piece by moving it to the row closest to your opponent
